SEARCH
Package org.udem.unishop.validation

Interface Validator

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailValidator, IntegerValidator, PasswordValidator, PhoneValidator, PointsValidator, PriceValidator, RatingValidator, StringValidator, UsernameValidator
public interface Validator
A generic interface for implementing input validation. Classes that implements this interface provides methods for checking the validity of input and gives an error message when the validation fails.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getErrorMessage()
    Gets the error message to be displayed when the input is invalid.
    boolean
    isValid(String input)
    Checks if the input string is valid.

  • Method Details

    • isValid

      boolean isValid(String input)
      Checks if the input string is valid.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the input string is valid, false otherwise.

    • getErrorMessage

      String getErrorMessage()
      Gets the error message to be displayed when the input is invalid.
      Returns:
      The error message for the invalid input.
